00029 int main(int argc, char* argv[])
00030 {
00031 
00032   // enough arguments ?
00033 
00034   if (argc < 2) {
00035     fprintf(stderr, "Usage: %s [OPTIONS] state\n"
00036             "\n   -g            debug"
00037             "\n   -q            quiet"
00038             "\n   -s            write (radial) densities into file"
00039             "\n   -l LABEL      use label"
00040             "\n   -r RANGE      radial range"
00041             "\n   -c RANGE      coordinate range\n",
00042             argv[0]);
00043     exit(-1);
00044   }
00045 
00046   int debug=0, quiet=0;
00047   int save=0;
00048   int shape=1;
00049   int view=1;
00050 
00051   double xmax=5.5;
00052   double rmax=5.4;
00053 
00054   int npoints=40+1;
00055   int izcw=5;
00056 
00057   char* label = NULL;
00058 
00059   char c;
00060   while ((c = getopt(argc, argv, "c:r:l:gqsn")) != -1)
00061     switch (c) {
00062     case 'g':
00063       debug=1;
00064       break;
00065     case 'q':
00066       quiet=1;
00067       break;
00068     case 's':
00069       save=1;
00070       break;
00071     case 'n':
00072       shape=0;
00073       break;
00074     case 'l':
00075       label=optarg;
00076       break;
00077     case 'c':
00078       xmax = atof(optarg);
00079       break;
00080     case 'r':
00081       rmax = atof(optarg);
00082       break;
00083     }   
00084 
00085 
00086   char* slaterdetfile = argv[optind];
00087 
00088   SlaterDet Q;
00089   readSlaterDetfromFile(&Q, slaterdetfile);
00090 
00091   if (!label)
00092     label = nucleusIDLformat(nucleusname(Q.A, Q.Z));
00093   
00094   double* dens = (double*) malloc(3*SQR(npoints)*sizeof(double));
00095   double* rdens = (double*) malloc(3*npoints*sizeof(double));
00096 
00097   // write densities to data files
00098 
00099   char datafile[255];
00100   FILE *datafp;
00101   int v;
00102 
00103   snprintf(datafile, 255, "%s.rdens", slaterdetfile);;
00104   if (!(datafp = fopen(datafile, "w"))) {
00105     fprintf(stderr, "couldn't open %s for writing\n", datafile);
00106     exit(-1);
00107   }
00108 
00109   int i,j;
00110   // coordinate space densities
00111   if (shape) {
00112     calcDensitiesCoordinate(&Q, view, npoints, xmax, dens);
00113 
00114     int axis=2;
00115     for (j=0; j<npoints; j++) {
00116       for (i=0; i<npoints; i++)
00117         fprintf(datafp, "%f  ", dens[j*npoints+i]/rho0);
00118       fprintf(datafp, "\n");
00119     }
00120   }
00121 
00122   // radial densities
00123   calcRadialDensitiesCoordinate(&Q, izcw, npoints, rmax, rdens);
00124   
00125   for (i=0; i<npoints; i++)
00126     fprintf(datafp, "%15.8g    ", rdens[i]);
00127   fprintf(datafp, "\n");
00128   for (i=0; i<npoints; i++)
00129     fprintf(datafp, "%15.8g    ", rdens[i+  npoints]);
00130   fprintf(datafp, "\n");
00131   for (i=0; i<npoints; i++)
00132     fprintf(datafp, "%15.8g    ", rdens[i+2*npoints]);
00133   fprintf(datafp, "\n");
00134 
00135   fclose(datafp);
00136 
00137   // write radial densities into file
00138   if (save) {
00139     char rdensfile[255];
00140     FILE* rdensfp;
00141 
00142     snprintf(rdensfile, 255, "%s.dens.dat", slaterdetfile);
00143     if (!(rdensfp = fopen(rdensfile, "w"))) {
00144       fprintf(stderr, "couldn't open %s for writing\n", rdensfile);
00145       exit(-1);
00146     }  
00147     
00148     for (i=0; i<npoints; i++)
00149       fprintf(rdensfp, "%8.3f\t%15.8g\t%15.8g\t%15.8g\n",
00150               rmax/(npoints-1)*i,
00151               rdens[i],
00152               rdens[i+  npoints],
00153               rdens[i+2*npoints]);
00154     
00155     fclose(rdensfp);
00156   }

00160 
00161   char scriptfile[255];
00162   FILE* scriptfp;

00164   char* fmdhome;
00165 
00166   if (!(fmdhome = getenv("FMD"))) {
00167     fprintf(stderr, "environment variable FMD not defined\n");
00168     exit(-1);
00169   }
00170 
00171   snprintf(scriptfile, 255, "%s.rdens.script", slaterdetfile);
00172   if (!(scriptfp = fopen(scriptfile, "w"))) {
00173     fprintf(stderr, "couldn't open %s for writing\n", scriptfile);
00174     exit(-1);
00175   }
00176 
00177   fprintf(scriptfp, 
00178           "; plot densities of nuclei\n; written by calcdens\n\n");
00179   fprintf(scriptfp, "densxy=fltarr(%d,%d,%d)\n", 
00180           npoints, npoints, 1);\
00181   fprintf(scriptfp, "rdens=fltarr(%d,3,%d)\n",
00182           npoints, 1);
00183 
00184   fprintf(scriptfp, "!path = '%s/lib:' + !path\n", fmdhome);
00185   fprintf(scriptfp, "openr, unit, '%s', /get_lun\n", datafile);
00186   if (shape)
00187     fprintf(scriptfp, "readf, unit, densxy\n");
00188   fprintf(scriptfp, "readf, unit, rdens\n");
00189   fprintf(scriptfp, "free_lun, unit\n");
00190   
00191   fprintf(scriptfp, "\n.run multipost, densityplot, radialdensityplot\n");
00192   fprintf(scriptfp, "!p.thick = 1.5\n");
00193   fprintf(scriptfp, "pos = initpost('%s.rdens.eps', %d, 1, gapx=2.0, /color)\n",
00194           slaterdetfile, 1+shape);
00195   fprintf(scriptfp, "!x.minor = 0\n!y.minor = 0\n");
00196   fprintf(scriptfp, "loadct, 3\n");
00197 
00198   fprintf(scriptfp, "!p.position = pos(0,*)\n");
00199   if (shape) {
00200     fprintf(scriptfp, "densityplot, densxy(*,*,%d), %d, %f, %f, %f, %f, $\n",
00201             0, view, -xmax, xmax, -xmax, xmax);
00202     fprintf(scriptfp, "\t/cut, /coordinate, /cont, /dens, key = '%s'\n", 
00203             label);
00204 
00205     fprintf(scriptfp, "!p.position = pos(1,*)\n");
00206   }
00207   fprintf(scriptfp, "!x.minor = 4\n!y.minor = 0\n");
00208   fprintf(scriptfp, "radialdensityplot, rdens(*,*,0), %f, $\n", rmax);
00209   fprintf(scriptfp, "\t/coordinate, key = \"%s\", /legend, /col\n",
00210           label);
00211   fprintf(scriptfp, "exit\n");
00212 
00213   fclose(scriptfp);
00214 
00215   // calling IDL
00216 
00217   char call[255];
00218 
00219   snprintf(call, 255, "idl < %s", scriptfile);
00220   system(call);
00221 
00222   char epsfile[255];
00223   snprintf(epsfile, 255, "%s.rdens.eps", slaterdetfile);
00224   // calling gv
00225 
00226   if (!quiet) {
00227     snprintf(call, 255, "gv %s &", epsfile);
00228     system(call);
00229   }
00230 
00231   // clean up
00232 
00233   if (!debug) {
00234     remove(datafile); 
00235     remove(scriptfile);
00236   }
00237 
00238   return 0;
00239 }
